overview: When Chip's parents are out of town he is going to have some fun! They tried sticking him with a babysitter but Chip's got her convinced to bring all her slutty college friends out for a weekend pool party. You know the equation - a bunch of horny college guys and girls get together on a sunny day at a pool and something is bound to happen! Stand back as these girls take charge with orgies, deep throating, anal and loads of cum!
title: Caught in the Middle
